name: Omnipotent Warrior
author: 做梦文化
content: In the future world, rifts in different dimensions suddenly appeared everywhere, and the world was divided into seven regions. All kinds of monsters in various legends all appeared in reality. The changes in the world have also brought new power to human beings, and towering star gates have appeared. Human beings entered it, awakened various extraordinary professions, embarking on a path of confrontation against the monsters.
